name: Try to Keep Warm
description:
You are a lone person in the woods. You only have the fire to keep warm and the axe to chop down trees and ward off predators. Keep the fire going for as long as possible with wood that you find.  Good luck!

Controls

  • WASD/Arrows: Move
  • Left Click/Enter: Swing Axe
  • F: Add a log to the fire (when nearby)
  • C: Eat a berry

I made this game for Mini Jam 124: Warmth.  The limitation was "Your score serves a purpose." My idea with this game is that you increase your score by keeping the fire going, and that allows you to survive. 

Most of the lovely art was part of the asset pack "Mystic Woods" by https://game-endeavor.itch.io/

The fire was in the asset pack "Fire Animation - Pixel Art FX Sprites" by Brullov.

Sound Effects: Slime, Axe, Fire, Add Log, Eat, Wind, Tree, Bush
